document.full_text: not everyone is happy that mohamed al-fayed has placed a statue of michael jackson outside the stadium of his club, fulham, but there is no denying he cares for his team.
document.title: on soccer: statue overshadows mohamed al-fayed's love for fulham
lines_and_colors: not everyone is happy that mohamed al-fayed has placed a statue of michael jackson outside the stadium of his club, fulham, but there is no denying he cares for his team.
